SEARCH

Class FoodItemDAO

java.lang.Object
FoodItemDAO
public class FoodItemDAO extends Object
The FoodItemDAO class is the data access object that provides an interface to the foodItem table in the SQLite database. It contains methods to retrieve, add and delete food items, As well as a method to filter the expired items. This class uses a FoodProductDAO object for retrieving associated FoodProduct information.
Version:
1.2
Author:
Chaima Jebri

  • Method Details

    • findAllItems

      public ArrayList<FoodItem> findAllItems()
      Retrieves all food items from the foodItem table in the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all food items.

    • findItem

      public FoodItem findItem(int foodItemId)
      Retrieves a food item from the database based on the foodItemID
      Parameters:
      foodItemId - the ID of the foodItem to retrieve
      Returns:
      The food item object, which can be null if not found in the database.

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(FoodItem foodItem)
      Adds a new food item to the database
      Parameters:
      foodItem - the new food item to be added in the database
      Returns:
      True if successfully added, false if not

    • deleteItem

      public boolean deleteItem(int foodItemId)
      Deletes a food item from the database based on the food item id
      Parameters:
      foodItemId - the ID of the food item to delete
      Returns:
      True if successfully deleted, false if not

    • filterExpiredItems

      public ArrayList<FoodItem> filterExpiredItems()
      Filters and retrieves all expired food items from the foodItem table in the database
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all expired food items
